title: DATS software schema
description: A digital entity containing sets of instructions and operation, which allows computation and operation of and by computer

name.description: a property to specify the name of the software program

licenses.description: a property used to specify to the terms of use of the software

version.description: an optional property used to specify a release point for the software when applicable

isUsedBy.description: The data acquisition activity that makes use of this instrument.

manufacturer.description: The person or organisation that produced the instrument.
